name: color me silly
description:
If game / audio lagging, try turning on hardware acceleration in browser.

Instructions:

Start the game and you will be given four numbers. 

The first two numbers indicate the shapes that you need to click on, and the second two numbers indicate the color these shapes need to have. 

Click a grid with the correct shapes with correct colors before the timer runs out. 

PRESENTATION
